org.drip.math.solver1D

Class VariateIteratorPrimitive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.solver1D.VariateIteratorPrimitive

  • public class VariateIteratorPrimitive
extends java.lang.Object
    VariateIteratorPrimitive implements the various Primitive Variate Iterator routines. VariateIteratorPrimitive implements the following iteration primitives: - Bisection - False Position - Quadratic - Inverse Quadratic - Ridder It may be readily enhanced to accommodate additional primitives.
